sources.title: Step by Step 1946 colorized (Anne Jeffreys)
sources.description: A war veteran (Lawrence Tierney) pursuing a senator's attractive secretary (Anne Jeffreys) stumbles on a Nazi plot at an isolated Malibu beach house, and they have to go on the run after being framed for murder. Lawrence Tierney as Johnny Christopher Anne Jeffreys as Evelyn Smith Lowell Gilmore as Von Dorn Myrna Dell as Gretchen Harry Harvey as Senator Remmy Addison Richards as James Blackton Ray Walker as Agent Jorgensen Jason Robards Sr. as Bruckner George Cleveland as Captain Caleb Simpson John Hamilton as Police Capt. Edmonds I colorized this using AI software that doesn't always get the colors right, but I think it looks fairly natural. Hopefully a more professional job will be done someday.
